Row.Text: Stronger than the Ship of the Line that it replaces, the First-Rate is more expensive to produce and slightly slower, however, it grants additional Defense to adjacent Naval Units and possesses additional Sight itself. It is unique to Great Britain.
Our people are now drinking your tea and romanticising about your royal weddings and systems of peerage. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

Ours is an ancient Parliament, full of customs and traditions that have stood the test of time. It is as much a reflection of our culture as it is a link between our gracious Queen and Her subjects. Only too fitting then should it be that the sovereign oversee it's opening.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Great Britain [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_GoldCost} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost is approximately equal to your next Social Policy cost[ENDCOLOR]

Ours is an ancient Parliament, full of customs and traditions that have stood the test of time. It is as much a reflection of our culture as it is a link between our gracious Queen and Her subjects. Only too fitting then should it be that the sovereign oversee it's opening.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy
Assume Control of the East India Company

The once honourable East India Company has become obsolete. It is run by a mob of prehensile slumlords that have no respect for the Crown and deny its due wealth. It is time that Her Majesty's Government step in and assume command, turning the Company once more into a profitable and dignified institution of the empire.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Great Britain [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have built the East India Company National Wonder [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the East India Company [ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on the East India Company

The once honourable East India Company has become obsolete. It is run by a mob of prehensile slumlords that have no respect for the Crown and deny its due wealth. It is time that Her Majesty's Government step in and assume command, turning the Company once more into a profitable and dignified institution of the empire.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the East India Company Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on the East India Company
{1_Name} of {2_CivName} has assumed control over the British East India Company.
In {1_City}, Charles Babbage has invented what he calls the 'Analytical Machine' - a machine capable of performing complex and automatic calculations!
A set of misinterpreted orders has led a unit of our cavalry to charge through a volley full of enemy guns. Our cavalry is now respected worldwide, however, our officers are now not.[NEWLINE]
We should invest in our brave mounted soldiers.
We need to improve our officer corps.
This proves Cavalry are a thing of the past.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A Military Academy is constructed in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Mounted Units are upgraded into Landships[ENDCOLOR]
Following a military blunder, we have invested in our mounted soldiers.
Following a military blunder, we have invested in our officer corps.
Following a military blunder, we have conceded that mounted warfare is obsolete.
A regiment of British Cavalry soldiers have charged heroically into a volley full of enemy guns.
A regiment of British Cavalry soldiers have charged carelessly into a volley full of enemy guns.
Yet another Judilee celebration has stirred the hearts of our subjects! They rejoice throughout the land for the longevity of our reign, and pray for many more to come. God save the Queen![NEWLINE]
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for {1_Num} turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have celebrated a Jubilee in honour of our long-reign.
{1_LeaderName} is celebrating her Jubilee year over the {2_CivName}.
